pages.text: The $(mob)Vex$() is a monster summoned by $(l:minecraft_evocation_illager)$(mob)Evokers$(). It attacks players and $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villagers$() by lunging at them, dealing damage on contact.$(p)It moves by flying around and can pass through solid walls. After a few minutes, it starts taking damage until it dies.
